fields.name: - Flipped ( <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> ):
fields.value:
- You now have __9/9__ **Spell Slots**.
 - You may take __2__ total **Ethereal** **Echo 1** cards from the cards in the lists above and below:
 - Absorb Elements (1882)
 - Mana Sear (1904)
 - Fruit Bowl (2119)

- These cards can spawn regardless as to whether or not they are brought to a competitive play session.
